abstract: The Boeing Company, whose factories have been shut since its 27,000 machinists walked out on Sept. 6, said a new round of talks last weekend had failed.
snippet: The Boeing Company, whose factories have been shut since its 27,000 machinists walked out on Sept. 6, said a new round of talks last weekend had failed.
lead_paragraph: The Boeing Company, whose factories have been shut since its 27,000 machinists walked out on Sept. 6, said a new round of talks last weekend have failed.
